bibl.title: A Letter from Taos to Markos.
bibl.note: Letter discovered during the 2011 excavation season at Berenike in the Eastern Desert. Taos writes from Koptos (or from an intermediate station on the desert road) to Markos at Berenike. Second half I AD.

bibl.title: Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno.

bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Berenike Inv. BE11-76/999/001 = P. Pintaudi 53
Ast Rodney and Roger S. Bagnall, A Letter from Taos to Markos.
Diletta Minutoli (a cura di), Inediti offerti a Rosario Pintaudi per il suo 65° compleanno (P.Pintaudi) (Firenze, 2012) pp. 233-236 et pll. L-LI.

Letter discovered during the 2011 excavation season at Berenike in the Eastern Desert. Taos writes from Koptos (or from an intermediate station on the desert road) to Markos at Berenike. Second half I AD.
